name: SURVIVOR (itch) (pedrolmsilva)
description:
A city-builder and action type game centralized in a space context where the player must survive in a new unknown planet, occupied by extraterrestrial beings, after his spaceship crashed after a long travel in space.

The player must build his own village with defenses and mining structures to gather resources to keep fighting and building.

Fight to recruit crew members to help defend, attack, and expand the village territory.
